name: Zen Blocks
description:
Zen Blocks is an addictive block puzzle game using original game play mechanics. Use your mouse to click the buttons around any of the 4 sides of the play grid to release a color block.



Stack a color block next to other blocks of the same color. Combine 4+ colors to remove a group and gain extra moves / time (5+ blocks). Connect blocks in a line or diagonally as long as they touch. Clear the screen to advance to the next level.

The game plays with relaxing music to create a calming and enjoyable gaming experience and also comes with a Learning mode.

There are two modes of play currently...

1. Level progression, where player must advance through puzzle levels that increase in difficulty, using a limited amount of moves and your brain. Players can take their time choosing their next move.

2. The second play mode is one that produces procedural levels with a countdown timer, which requires fast thinking to advance to the next screen. A great block puzzle brain teaser.

  • Addictive block puzzle game
  • Multiple Game Modes including Level Mode, Timer Mode
  • Gain Moves / Time by achieving Super and Zen bonuses
  • Beautiful relaxing colorful gameplay
